name: logo
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Returns logo of the company.

Availability: Basic plan
Data weighting: 1 API credit per symbol

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.

country.description: The country where the company is based. Defaults to None.

exchange.description: The stock exchange where the company is listed. Defaults to None.
